thread.title: Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury
thread.title_full: Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury
text:
Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury The senior guard came down awkwardly in the lane. Post to Facebook Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury The senior guard came down awkwardly in the lane.  //usat.ly/2luHimB   Michigan State's Eron Harris carried off on stretcher after scary injury USA TODAY Sports 5:59   Michigan State's Eron Harris defends Purdue's Caleb Swanigan. (Photo: Michael Hickey, Getty Images) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Michigan State senior guard was carried off on a stretcher Saturday at Purdue after crashing awkwardly on his right leg. 
Harris howled in pain while being treated on the court. It was officially listed as a knee injury, according to Michigan State. 
Emotional Michigan State players huddled up, and. Miles Bridges was in tears. 
According to ESPN, Harris remained in the locker room and was not immediately transported to a hospital. Emotional moment. Harris taken off the court on the stretcher. Michigan State players huddle up. Miles Bridges was crying for a moment. — Brendan F. Quinn (@BFQuinn) February 18, 2017 hdsportsclips: Eron Harris screaming in pain ESPN College Basketball: Michigan State at Pur… https://t.co/tFAl04J0bN pic.twitter.com/VfrVvx3E8K NEVER MISS OUT Sports Stay in the know and in the zone, 7 days a week, with scores, analysis, and in-depth features and commentary. We're sorry.
